description: The Shikoku Hachijuuhakki Yakou or 88 Demons of Shikoku is an organization of yakuza youkai in Shikoku composed of 88 groups which was first built more than three hundred years ago by Inugamigyoubu Danuki. After being defeated by a force of humans while trying to overtake Matsuyama Castle, the group fell into decline. It was rebuilt by Inugamigyoubu Danuki`s son Tamazuki, who sought to take over the Nura Clan`s base of operations and, eventually, the world.
name: Shikoku Hachijuuhakki Yakou
